titles.title: State Offices of Rural Health Program Reauthorization Act of 2022
State Offices of Rural Health Program Reauthorization Act of 2022
State Offices of Rural Health Program Reauthorization Act of 2022
State Offices of Rural Health Program Reauthorization Act of 2022
State Offices of Rural Health Program Reauthorization Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the State offices of rural health program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Pallone moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 4978.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
State Offices of Rural Health Program Reauthorization Act of 2022
This act reauthorizes through FY2027 grants awarded to state offices of rural health for improving health care in rural areas.
